name: Endless Spaceship (Marafigo Games)
description:
With a spaceship defend yourself from obstacles and enemies, every 1500 points choose an improvement. The more points, the better placed in the world ranking!

WARNING! The ranking system will only work for the Steam version (not yet posted).

WS - Move // Mouse - Shoot (Aim)

Did you like it? please leave your opinion about this game still in development. If you can, make a donation to help us! Thanks!
